mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jibsa VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{jibsaGender}, #{jibsaRrn}, #{isSmoking}, #{workCareer}, '00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000', #{availableArea}, #{motive}, #{expectedSalary}, 'kakao', 'N', sysdate, sysdate, 'N', #{license});
mapper.select: select * from jibsa join member using(member_no) where member_no = #{memberNo}
select count(*) from matching where jibsa_no = #{mNo} and matching_status = 'Y'

select mc.matching_no, mc.animal_no, a.animal_name, a.animal_kind, mc.start_date, mc.end_date, mc.matching_place, mc.review_content, mc.review_rating, mc.review_count, mc.jibsa_comment, m.member_name, m.member_no, jp.jibsa_name, jp.member_no, mc.matching_status, mc.review_status from matching mc join animal a on(a.animal_no = mc.animal_no) join jibsa_profile jp on(mc.jibsa_no = jp.member_no) join member m on(mc.member_no = m.member_no) where mc.jibsa_no = #{mNo} and mc.matching_status = 'Y' order by mc.matching_no desc

select mc.matching_no, mc.animal_no, a.animal_name, a.animal_kind, mc.start_date, mc.end_date, mc.matching_place, mc.review_content, mc.review_rating, mc.review_count, mc.jibsa_comment, m.member_name, m.member_no, jp.jibsa_name, jp.member_no, mc.matching_status, mc.review_status from matching mc join animal a on(a.animal_no = mc.animal_no) join jibsa_profile jp on(mc.jibsa_no = jp.member_no) join member m on(mc.member_no = m.member_no) where mc.matching_no = #{mcNo}
SELECT j.jibsa_name, j.profile_title, j.member_no FROM jibsa_profile j JOIN matching m ON (m.member_no = j.member_no) WHERE m.jibsa_no = j.member_no
